descriptionHtml:
Installation
-------------------
Step 1. Extract the skyrimprefs file on to a location of your choise on your computer
Step 2. Copy that file
Step 3. Locate your skyrim folder, usually C:/program files/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
Step 4. Inside the skyrim folder you will find another folder named skyrim, click it.
Step 5. Overwrite the current Skyrimprefs if there is one, if not just insert the one you were given

All information on how i made the mod can be found on my blog: http://gamerdungeon.co.cc/

WARNING: The Skyrimprefs.ini has some settings that are system specific. and therefor will cause problems on systems that are different from the author\'s. I recommend that if you are going to try this make a backup copy of the original file first. The easiest way is to just rename the skyrimprefs.ini to something like Skyrimprefs.abc. Then copy his file in as Skyrimprefs.ini If it causes problems on your computer you can delete his skyrimprefs.ini and rename your original back to the original name.

This file WILL remove any changes you or any mods that make changes to the prefs ini have made.
 to your Skyrimprefs.ini

Bben46, Moderator
author: nix9862
